shrimp.name: CookTorrance
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Cook-Torrance specular term. The distro variable controls the probability distribution function being used, being 0 = Beckmann (default), 1 = Ward, 2 = Trowbridge-Reitz, 3 = Heidrich-Seidel (anisotropic). The geo variable controls the geometric attenuation function being used, being 0 = Torrance-Sparrow (default, 1 = Smith, 2 = He-Torrance. In the case of the Heidrich-Seidel anisotropic distribution, an isotropic specular term is added via specularbrdf(). The specular color value is passed to aov_specularcolor, while the specular value, to the aov_specular AOV presets.
